Package ru.nsu.lavitskaya.snake

Class SatedSnake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.lavitskaya.snake.Snake
ru.nsu.lavitskaya.snake.EnemySnake
ru.nsu.lavitskaya.snake.SatedSnake
public class SatedSnake extends EnemySnake
A “sated” enemy snake that wanders randomly in any safe direction, avoiding collisions.

Unlike EnemySnake, this snake does not pursue food; it simply picks a random safe direction each turn and moves one step.

  • Constructor Details

    • SatedSnake

      public SatedSnake(Point start)
      Creates a new SatedSnake at the specified starting position. The snake’s SnakeType is set to SATED.
      Parameters:
      start - the initial head position of this snake

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(int mapRows, int mapColumns, List<Food> foodList, List<Obstacle> obstacles, Snake playerSnake, List<EnemySnake> enemySnakes)
      Updates this snake’s position by choosing a random safe direction, checking for collisions with the player or obstacles, and moving one cell.

      The snake will die (be marked DEAD) if it has no safe moves or if it collides with the player’s snake.

      Overrides:
      update in class EnemySnake
      Parameters:
      mapRows - the number of rows on the game board
      mapColumns - the number of columns on the game board
      foodList - the list of Food items currently on the board
      obstacles - the list of Obstacle objects on the board
      playerSnake - the player’s Snake
      enemySnakes - the list of all enemy snakes (including this one)
